Package game.characters.enemies

Class GodrickTheGrafted

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actors.Actor
game.characters.enemies.boss.GodrickTheGrafted
All Implemented Interfaces:
game.engine.capabilities.Capable, game.engine.displays.Printable, SpecialDeath, Resettable
public class GodrickTheGrafted
extends game.engine.actors.Actor
implements Resettable, SpecialDeath
Class representing the final boss of the game, Godrick the Grafted.
Author:
Harshath Muruganantham
See Also:
Actor, Resettable, SpecialDeath

      At each turn, select a valid action to perform.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class game.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found
